name: Simona de Silvestro
status: Driving in the Australian Supercars Championship
introduction: Simona de Silvestro (born September 1, 1988) is a Swiss racing driver who has raced in IndyCar from 2010 until 2013. In February 2014, de Silvestro joined the Sauber team as an affiliated driver. She left the team in October 2014 due to contractual troubles and returned to IndyCar racing.
